column4: hey i removed the sound applet from the top panel and i can't find it in add to panel how can i restor it??????????
the volume icon is included in the "Indicator Applet" for the panel
right-click the panel and select "Add Applet" and select either "Indicator Applet", or "Indicator Applet Session" depending on whether or not you wish to have the IM panel as well.
